CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
M has a heavy accent and M and C mumble and talk in very low voices; this transcript may be UNUSABLE due to the many xxx's

u.a: M picks up the tray; M and C manipulate dishes
M indicates where she is setting things
C pours from teapot in cups
C talks to himself while pouring
M shows C how to set cup on a saucer
C pours into cup and saucer M holds
C almost knocked cup off saucer
M reaches for a spoon and container
it appears that toy people from house are now involved in game
C reaches in house; M reaches after
M and C are looking at Care_Bear feelings book
M points back at first picture
C points in book at first picture
M points at different places in book as she speaks
C starts to turn some pages back; seems to be looking for something
M tries to pull Care_bear book away from C; doesn't succeed; sets her book down and looks at nursery rhyme book instead; C lets Care_bear book go and looks at nursery rhyme book with M
M points at picture on cover
M opens second book she picked up; C still looks at cover of nursery rhyme book
M points as she names animals
C points at different places on cover
M points at top of book cover
M points at two places on book; turns attention to book she opened
C looks at book M has; she tilts book near him
M points in book while she reads
C reaches out to take the book
C closes book and touches nursery rhyme book
C points at book cover picture
M opens book; turns a few pages while they both look
M points in book while she reads
M turns page; C seems to be asking her something
M looks at C; C smiles widely; M laughs; M points in book
C points at a different picture
